BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 050173 PCM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the site selection and acquisition of real property located at 91st Street , Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 5, for use as a Marine Transfer Station.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: The submission of a site plan by the New York City School Construction Authority, pursuant to §1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law, for a school, an primary/intermediate school facility , to be located at 965 East 107th Street, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 42.  (Non-ULURP no. 20055132 SCK)
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 050173 PCM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the site selection and acquisition of real property located at 91st Street , Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 5, for use as a Marine Transfer Station.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
